name: Spooky Hunt (JulioLeZermouk)
description:
In Spooky Hunt, you must catch ghosts with your vacuum cleaner but watch the light because she will be quickly down, then remeber where were ghosts and catch them first until the light is reloaded.

==================================================

The game was made for mobile phone in an exercise but never worn on mobile by lack of time.

 Use the mouse cursor and click on the screen to use the vacuum cleaner, it use stamina and if you reach 0 you need to wait that the stamina gauge get fulfilled. 

When the light is down, wait until the yellow switch is fulfilled and click on it to light up or use SPACE. 

More you survive, faster are ghosts, dont let any one reach your vacuum cleaner at the bottom of the screen.

You can get coins to buy upgrades in the shop. The shop is in french, for peoples who are not speaking french it's, in order : "more stamina", "light reloading faster", "stamina reloading faster", "score multiplier".

Finally, it's a prototype thinked for mobile phone so we didnt include a way to leave the game so you need to ALT+F4.

==================================================

Game  made in one week by Richard VERET (SHADOW 6004 : https://shadow-6004.itch.io) and Julien FETAS (Julio le Zermouk).
